privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.collectionDescription: We only collect the data that you voluntarily provide to us when you register, log in or provide information via the contact form.
privacy.usage: How do we use your data?
privacy.usageDescription: The data we collect is used to personalize your user experience and to improve our website. We use your information to respond to your requests, process orders and communicate with you.
privacy.protection: How do we protect your data?
privacy.protectionDescription: We use various security measures to protect your personal information when you place an order or access your personal information. We use secure servers and encrypt your data to prevent unauthorized access.
privacy.disclosure: Will your data be passed on to third parties?
privacy.disclosureDescription: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. However, this does not include trusted third parties who assist us in administering our website, conducting our business, or servicing our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
privacy.consent: By using our website, you agree to our privacy policy.
privacy.contact: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, you can reach us via the contact form.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.registerDescription: To register, click on the 'Register' button and fill out the form.
faq.loginDescription: To log in, click on the 'Login' button and fill out the form.
faq.logoutDescription: To log out, click on the 'Logout' button.
faq.updateData: How can I update my data?
faq.updateDataDescription: To update your data, click on the 'Profile' button and fill out the form.
faq.deleteAccount: How can I delete my account?
faq.deleteAccountDescription: To delete your account, click on the 'Profile' button and then click on the 'Delete' button.
faq.forgotPassword: How can I request a new password?
faq.forgotPasswordDescription: To request a new password, click on the 'Login' button and then click on the 'Forgot Password' button.
faq.resetPassword: How can I reset my password?
faq.resetPasswordDescription: To reset your password, click on the 'Login' button and then click on the 'Forgot Password' button.

home.title: Welcome to our auction platform
home.subtitleContent: Here you can find a variety of products that you can bid on. You can also add products to your watchlist and view your profile.
